title: Chinese peppered yard-long beans
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons green peppercorns', 'handful coarsely chopped fresh coriander', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '450g (16 oz) Chinese yard-long beans', '4 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 dessertspoon dark brown soft sugar', '1 small red chilli, seeded and finely chopped', '2 tablespoons water']
